languages.text: "Вряд ли. Такова суть служебной собаки. Но будьте уверены — вы у Глейто на особом счету, раз он больше не точит об вашу руку клыки".
"Probably never. That's just how Arbites dogs are. But Glaito definitely has a soft spot for you, considering he's not gnawing on your hand anymore."
languages.original_text: "Вряд ли. Такова суть служебной собаки. Но будьте уверены — вы у Глейто на особом счету, раз он больше не точит об вашу руку клыки".

traits.locale_text: "Unlikely. That's just how Arbites dogs are. But Glaito definitely has a soft spot for you, since he's not gnawing on your hand anymore."
"Unlikely. That's just how Arbites dogs are. But Glaito definitely has a soft spot for you, since he's not gnawing on your hand anymore."

"Probably never. That's just how Arbites dogs are. But Glaito definitely has a soft spot for you, considering he's not gnawing on your hand anymore."
"Probably never. That's just how Arbites dogs are. But Glaito definitely has a soft spot for you, considering he's not gnawing on your hand anymore."

languages.text: 「たぶん一生無理でしょうね。高等裁定局の犬とは、そういうものです。ですがグライトがあなたに好意を抱いてるのは確かですよ。もうあなたの手を噛んでないことが、その証拠です」
languages.original_text: "Probably never. That's just how Arbites dogs are. But Glaito definitely has a soft spot for you, considering he's not gnawing on your hand anymore."

traits.locale_text: 「たぶん一生無理でしょうね。高等裁定局の犬とは、そういうものです。ですがグライトがあなたに好意を抱いてるのは確かですよ。もうあなたの手を噛んでないことが、その証拠です」

languages.text: "Wahrscheinlich nie. So sind Arbites-Hunde nun mal. Aber Glaito mag Euch, kein Zweifel, immerhin kaut er nicht mehr auf Eurer Hand herum."
languages.original_text: "Probably never. That's just how Arbites dogs are. But Glaito definitely has a soft spot for you, considering he's not gnawing on your hand anymore."

traits.locale_text: "Wahrscheinlich nie. So sind Arbites-Hunde nun mal. Aber Glaito mag Euch, kein Zweifel, immerhin kaut er nicht mehr auf Eurer Hand herum."

languages.text: « Probablement jamais. Les chiens de l'Arbites sont ainsi. Mais il est clair que Glaito vous apprécie, vu qu'il n'essaie plus de vous dévorer la main. »
languages.original_text: "Probably never. That's just how Arbites dogs are. But Glaito definitely has a soft spot for you, considering he's not gnawing on your hand anymore."

traits.locale_text: « Probablement jamais. Les chiens de l'Arbites sont ainsi. Mais il est clair que Glaito vous apprécie, vu qu'il n'essaie plus de vous dévorer la main. »

languages.text: «Probablemente nunca. Así son los perros del Arbites. Pero viendo que ya ha dejado de roerle la mano, diría que Glaito le tiene aprecio».
languages.original_text: "Probably never. That's just how Arbites dogs are. But Glaito definitely has a soft spot for you, considering he's not gnawing on your hand anymore."

traits.locale_text: «Probablemente nunca. Así son los perros del Arbites. Pero viendo que ya ha dejado de roerle la mano, diría que Glaito le tiene aprecio».

languages.text: “可能永远都不会，法务部的狗就是这个样子。不过，格雷托显然对你很有好感，毕竟它已经不咬你的手了。”
languages.original_text: "Probably never. That's just how Arbites dogs are. But Glaito definitely has a soft spot for you, considering he's not gnawing on your hand anymore."

traits.locale_text: “可能永远都不会，法务部的狗就是这个样子。不过，格雷托显然对你很有好感，毕竟它已经不咬你的手了。”

languages.text: "Muhtemelen asla. Arbites köpekleri böyledir. Ama elinizi tekrar kemirmediğini düşünürsek Glaito'nun size karşı biraz da olsa yumuşadığını söyleyebilirim."
languages.original_text: "Probably never. That's just how Arbites dogs are. But Glaito definitely has a soft spot for you, considering he's not gnawing on your hand anymore."

traits.locale_text: "Muhtemelen asla. Arbites köpekleri böyledir. Ama elinizi tekrar kemirmediğini düşünürsek Glaito'nun size karşı biraz da olsa yumuşadığını söyleyebilirim."

languages.original_text: "Probably never. That's just how Arbites dogs are. But Glaito definitely has a soft spot for you, considering he's not gnawing on your hand anymore."
